column8: Special
This creature counts as all factions and categories for card abilities.
All dragons you control get +1 Attack and +1 Defense.
This creature gets +1 Attack against flying creatures.
Knights in the same group as this creature get +1 Attack and +1 Defense.
While this creature is defending, you do not need to discard traps from the outpost this creature is defending in order to resolve their effects.
When you draft this card, replace it with one of the Quests or with a Questor creature. If two or more players drafted a Quest, resolve them in turn order.
Either repair one damage from an outpost or deal one damage to a creature.
Gain one mana.
Gain three mana.
Repair one damage from an outpost.
Discard this card to remove Flying from all of your opponent's flying creatures until the end of the turn.
At the start of your turn, gain one mana.
Once per turn, you may spend one mana to place a token on this card. Once per turn, you may discard a token from this card to gain one mana.
At the end of the game, if you only have Fire cards in play (except this card), reveal a Fire secret card.
At the end of the game, if you only have Water cards in play (except this card), reveal a Water secret card.
At the end of the game, if you only have Earth cards in play (except this card), reveal a Earth secret card.
At the end of the game, if you only have Air cards in play (except this card), reveal a Air secret card.
At the end of the game, if you have four or more Shard cards in play, reveal a Shard secret card
At the end of the game, if you have five or more Silver cards in play, reveal a Silver secret card.
